subject: Request to Cancel Order SSN4426
description_text:
Hello,

I hope you’re doing well. I am emailing to request the cancellation of my
order SSN4426 for the Stimulator Gear Shifter, placed on December 5th.


Please let me know once the cancellation has been processed or if any
additional information is needed.

Thank you for your help.


Best regards,

Adrina Alvarez

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 7915 中
